MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Bagillt, affecting properties in Ridgehill Drive and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:12AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05AM on 4th February 2021
